permafrost.tundra.lang

Class BytesHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.BytesHelper

  • public class BytesHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with byte[] objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] base64Decode(java.lang.String input)
      Decodes a base64-encoded string to binary data.
      static java.lang.String base64Encode(byte[] input)
      Encodes binary data as a base64-encoded string.
      static byte[] normalize(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
      Converts the given java.io.InputStream to a byte[] by reading all data from the stream and then closing the stream.
      static byte[] normalize(java.lang.Object object)
      Normalizes the given String, byte[], or java.io.InputStream object to a byte[].
      static byte[] normalize(java.lang.Object object, java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Normalizes the given String, byte[], or java.io.InputStream object to a byte[].
      static byte[] normalize(java.lang.Object object, java.lang.String charsetName)
      Normalizes the given String, byte[], or java.io.InputStream object to a byte[].

      Converts the given String to an byte[].

      Converts the given String to an byte[] using the given character encoding set.

      Converts the given String to an byte[] using the given character encoding set.
